label: uncl7431
comment: Code qualifying the type of agreement.

values.label: Type of participation
values.comment: The subject of the agreement is the type of participation.

values.label: Credit cover agreement
values.comment: Agreement on protection against risk of credit losses on sales to buyers.

values.label: Cedent's treaty identifier
values.comment: Identifies the treaty as assigned by the cedent.

values.label: Reinsurer's treaty identifier
values.comment: Identifies the treaty as assigned by the reinsurer.

values.label: Type of contract letting
values.comment: The type of agreement needed to specify construction works tendered out as public or restricted.

values.label: Contractor responsibility and liability structure
values.comment: The way the contractor(s) are structured to perform a contract for the purpose of responsibility and liability.

values.label: Contract
values.comment: The type of agreement is a contract.

values.label: Grid connection contract
values.comment: Contract for connection to a grid.
